name: PayByPhone
0:
”Alexa, ask PayByPhone to start a parking session.”
”Alexa, ask PayByPhone to extend my parking.”
”Alexa, ask PayByPhone to get my parking info.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pay by phone
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Trusted by 17 million users, PayByPhone is the market leading payment service for parking, bringing you a simple, secure, and convenient way to pay for your parking.

Simply say, “Alexa, ask PayByPhone to start parking” to begin a new parking session. Then tell Alexa your location number and how long you want to park for. That’s it. You’ll be on your way in no time. 

With PayByPhone’s official Alexa skill you can also add time to an existing parking session or ask Alexa how much time you have left on your current parking. 

This skill requires you to connect your existing PayByPhone account through account linking.

PayByPhone is available in supported cities in the United Kingdom, France, United States and Canada.
